text: 18.6 Ese 18.13, Apo 13.45-46, 13.51, 20.26, 1 Pi 4.4 Anɨb agak ag pen, takaw nop ak ma nɨŋɨd, nop agjuwɨlak. Agjuwelak, God nop taynen kelɨgɨpal agɨl, chech ne ak pɨpal pakɨlɨg, kɨlop agak, Yad nɨbop God takaw ak agñen ma nepɨm ak, tap nɨbi ke agak. Mɨñɨl nɨbop Juda binɨb kelɨgɨl, binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop agñɨnɨgayn agak.
